about_the_game:
RogueOut is a unique twist on the classic Breakout-style game, introducing roguelike elements for a fresh and exciting experience. You start by selecting from a variety of powerful balls, each with distinct abilities, and your goal is to clear a field of diverse bricks by strategically launching your ball into them.

RogueOut introduces an array of distinct Brick Types, adding layers of complexity and excitement. For instance:

Armored Bricks: These formidable bricks are clad in layers of armor. Your task is to strategically chip away at this armor until you expose the brick, which you can then destroy.

Immunizer Bricks: These crafty bricks confer immunity on two random bricks within the field. Your objective is to annihilate the Immunizer Brick first before you can dismantle the shielded bricks.

Healer Bricks: These elusive bricks periodically heal random bricks within the game field. You'll need to target and destroy the Healer Brick swiftly to prevent the restoration of other bricks."


.

RogueOut is a unique twist on the classic Breakout-style game, introducing roguelike elements for a fresh and exciting experience. You start by selecting from a variety of powerful balls, each with distinct abilities, and your goal is to clear a field of diverse bricks by strategically launching your ball into them.

RogueOut introduces an array of distinct Brick Types, adding layers of complexity and excitement. For instance:

Armored Bricks: These formidable bricks are clad in layers of armor. Your task is to strategically chip away at this armor until you expose the brick, which you can then destroy.

Immunizer Bricks: These crafty bricks confer immunity on two random bricks within the field. Your objective is to annihilate the Immunizer Brick first before you can dismantle the shielded bricks.

Healer Bricks: These elusive bricks periodically heal random bricks within the game field. You'll need to target and destroy the Healer Brick swiftly to prevent the restoration of other bricks."

name: RogueOut

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (Intel HD Graphics or AMD APU)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: RogueOut is a fresh take on Breakout with roguelike elements. Wield powerful balls, strategize against dynamic bricks, and explore unique mechanics in each playthrough. This strategic, arcade-style game redefines the classic, promising endless replayability and thrill.
